ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Akebono RDM electron flux annual plots
ResourceHeader.Description:
There are two families of electron flux plots.
"Mapping plots" show annually averaged color-coded fluxes of 
0.3-0.95, 0.95-2.5 and >2.5 MeV electrons, plotted in a radial
distance vs. latitude projected into a common meridional plane.
Lines of constant McIlwain-L parameter are superposed.  "Flux 
plots" show color-coded fluxes of >2.5 MeV electrons vs. 
McIlwain-L and time,with each plot covering one full year.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
In any publications, the use of the Akebono 
data should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono RDM/HPM data 
were provided by Akira S. Yukimatu through DARTS at Institute of 
Space and Astronautical Science, JAXA in Japan."

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement:
In any publications, the use of the Akebono data 
should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono LEP data were provided 
by Akira S. Yukimatu through DARTS at Institute of Space and Astronautical 
Science, JAXA in Japan."
